javadoc: AbstractListingMerger is an abstract class that each type of listing merge manager can extend to gain access to commonly needed information such as the programs, the listing merge panel, Diffs for Latest-Original and My-Original and Latest-My, etc.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: listingMergeMgr
params.comment: the overall manager for the associated listing merge.

methods.javadoc:
Initializes the four programs and each of the ProgramDiffs typically needed to perform the merge.
Note: If you override this method, it should be the first method you call as "super.init()" to setup the common listing merge information.
methods.name: init
methods.comment:
Initializes the four programs and each of the ProgramDiffs
 typically needed to perform the merge.
 Note: If you override this method, it should be the first method you call
 as "super.init()" to setup the common listing merge information.

methods.name: getProgramIndex
methods.comment: Gets the merge constant associated with the indicated program.

return.comment:
RESULT, LATEST, MY, ORIGINAL, or -1.
 A value of -1 indicates the program is not one of the four versioned programs.

methods.name: getProgramForConflictOption
methods.comment: Gets the program associated with the indicated conflictOption

return.comment: the program for the option or null

methods.name: limitToStartofCodeUnits
methods.comment:
Gets an address set indicating all addresses in the initial set that are the
 minimum address of a code unit in the specified program's listing.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program to check for the start of each code unit.

params.name: initialSet
params.comment: the initial address set to be checked for the starts of code units.

return.comment: the address set of all code unit min addresses in the initial set.

methods.name: getCodeUnitAddressSet
methods.comment:
Return an address set that contains all addresses that make up the code
 units containing the indicated address in the LATEST, MY,  ORIGINAL programs.

methods.name: getCodeUnitAddressSet
methods.comment:
Return an address set that contains all addresses that make up the code
 units containing the indicated addresses in the LATEST, MY,  ORIGINAL programs.

methods.javadoc: Clears all text from the error buffer.
methods.name: clearResolveErrors
methods.comment: Clears all text from the error buffer.

methods.javadoc:
This is a generic method for displaying the contents of the error
 buffer to the user.
methods.name: showResolveErrors
methods.comment:
This is a generic method for displaying the contents of the error
 buffer to the user.

methods.javadoc: Clears all text from the information buffer.
methods.name: clearResolveInfo
methods.comment: Clears all text from the information buffer.

methods.javadoc:
This is a generic method for displaying the contents of the information
 buffer to the user.
methods.name: showResolveInfo
methods.comment:
This is a generic method for displaying the contents of the information
 buffer to the user.

methods.name: same
methods.comment:
Returns whether or not the two indicated objects are equal. It allows
 either or both of the specified objects to be null.

return.comment: true if the objects are equal.

methods.javadoc: Updates the progress bar associated with this phase of the merge. Before beginning to auto-merge the totalChanges and changeNum<\code> must be set. This method should then be called as changes are made to update the change bar. This assumes that each change is equivalent in terms of shown progress. @param increment the number of changes completed relative to the total number of changes for this auto-merger.
methods.name: incrementProgress
methods.comment:
Updates the progress bar associated with this phase of the merge.
 Before beginning to auto-merge the totalChanges and changeNum\code must be set.
 This method should then be called as changes are made to update the change bar.
 This assumes that each change is equivalent in terms of shown progress.

params.name: increment
params.comment:
the number of changes completed relative to the total
 number of changes for this auto-merger.

methods.name: updateProgressMessage
methods.comment: Updates the progress message details associated with this phase of the merge.

methods.name: updateProgress
methods.comment: Updates the progress bar associated with this phase of the merge.

params.name: myPercentComplete
params.comment:
the progress percentage completed for this merger.
 This should be a value from 0 to 100.

methods.name: updateProgress
methods.comment:
Updates the progress bar and the progress message details associated with this
 phase of the merge.

params.name: myPercentComplete
params.comment:
the progress percentage completed for this merger.
 This should be a value from 0 to 100.

name: AbstractListingMerger
comment:
AbstractListingMerger is an abstract class that each type of
 listing merge manager can extend to gain access to commonly needed information
 such as the programs, the listing merge panel,
 Diffs for Latest-Original and My-Original and Latest-My, etc.
